subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Bahrain’s investment in motor sports may look like an exercise in vanity, but behind the high finance lies a sober business strategy to develop one of the world’s most dynamic regions.
snippet: Bahrain’s investment in motor sports may look like an exercise in vanity, but behind the high finance lies a sober business strategy to develop one of the world’s most dynamic regions.
